name: The Chai Tapree - Chai speciality cafe

reviews.text:
Just had a lovely time at @thechaitapree!
As a dosa lover, I had to try their Matcha Dosa ‚Äî and wow, it didn‚Äôt disappoint. Crispy, tasty, and that hint of matcha? Perfect.
The Matcha Mango Lassi was refreshingly different too.
Super convenient location right next to Simei MRT and the Indian supermarket. Great for a quick meal or chai stop. Bonus: the food isn‚Äôt too spicy, so it‚Äôs kid-friendly.
Don‚Äôt miss the Indian sweets and pulav ‚Äî and their chai game is strong (pink chai was my fav!).

Foodie Perspective ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è
Innovative Indian cuisine done right! The Matcha Dosa at @thechaitapree is a must-try ‚Äî it‚Äôs a brilliant fusion that still feels authentic.  The Matcha Mango Lassi is a flavor bomb ‚Äî mango and matcha blend seamlessly. . I just cant believe I had two glasses of those . I also tried their Indian sweets and cardamom chai, and I‚Äôm officially obsessed. The location couldn‚Äôt be better, connected to Simei MRT. Ideal spot for both adventurous foodies and traditional taste lovers alike.

A hidden gem near Simei!üòç

Just had an amazing experience at The Chai Tapree! As a dosa lover, the Matcha Dosa was a pleasant surprise ‚Äî crispy, flavorful, with that subtle matcha twist. The Matcha Mango Lassi? So refreshing.The Pani Puri setup was super fun with the auto-dispensing machine.

Their chai game is next level ‚Äî from Pink Chai to Cardamom Masala Chai, everything‚Äôs brewed to perfection (not overly sweet, which I appreciate). Also loved the Sev Puri and the variety of Indian sweets.

Located right next to Simei MRT and the Indian supermarket, it‚Äôs perfect for a quick snack, casual hangout, or proper tea stop. Kid-friendly, vegetarian-friendly, and honestly just wholesome vibes all around. Service is warm, and the owner‚Äôs passion really shines through.

Had a great dining experience at @thechaitapree! As a dosa fan, I was so impressed with their Matcha Dosa, a modern twist that truly delivers on taste. The Matcha Mango Lassi was equally delightful, blending unique flavors perfectly.
.
A must-try for anyone who loves chai, dosa, and innovative flavors!
Savour authentic Indian treats with a modern twist at Singapore‚Äôs only Indian chai cafe located at Eastpoint Mall. The Matcha Mango Lassi and Matcha Dosa are must-tries!
